Make sure that your hearing aids are in pairing mode.
The accessibility button is set to %1$s. To use magnification, touch & hold the accessibility button, then select magnification.
It can track your interactions with an app or a hardware sensor, and interact with apps on your behalf.
It can read all content on the screen and display content over other apps.
%1$s is requesting full control of this device. The service can read the screen and act on behalf of users with accessibility needs. This level of control is not appropriate for most apps.
Full control is appropriate for apps that help you with accessibility needs, but not for most apps.

"Once shortcut setting has been enabled, you can start an accessibility feature in one of two ways: 1. Press both volume up and down keys for 3 seconds. 2. Long-press the power button until you hear a sound or feel a vibration, then long-press the screen with two fingers until you hear audio confirmation."
Update screen magnification on app transitions

"To turn this service on or off, tap the accessibility button%sat the bottom of your screen.
To switch between services, touch & hold the accessibility button."
Screen attention uses the front camera to see if someone is looking at the screen. It works on-device, and images are never stored or sent to Google.
On/Screen won’t turn off if you’re looking at it
"Revoke access to USB debugging from all computers you've previously authorised?"
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification and read log data.

"By proceeding, your user will be managed by your admin, which may also be able to store associated data, in addition to your personal data.
Your admin has the ability to monitor and manage settings, access, apps and data associated with this user, including network activity and your device's location information."
"Your admin can monitor and manage apps and data associated with this device, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity and the device's location information."
"Your admin can monitor and manage apps and data associated with your work profile, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity and the device's location information."
"Your admin can monitor and manage apps and data associated with this user, including settings, permissions, corporate access, network activity and the device's location information."

Let the app make sound, vibrate and/or pop notifications on screen
Allow this app to display on top of other apps that you’re using. It may interfere with your use of those apps or change the way they seem to appear or behave.
"You've chosen to allow this app to create widgets and access their data."
Lifting your device will turn on the screen. This allows you to check the time and notifications. Please note that this feature is only available when screen lock is set.
To check time, notification icons and other info, double-tap your screen.
To check time, notifications and other info, tap your screen.

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, contacts and more.
Just bring the devices together so that the NFC detection areas touch each other, then tap your screen. The app determines what is beamed."

Assist apps can help you based on information from the screen that you’re viewing. Some apps support both launcher and voice input services to give you integrated assistance.
The assistant will be able to read information about apps that are in use on your system, including information visible on your screen or accessible within the apps.
Use server to assist GPS (un-tick to improve GPS performance)
Use server to assist GPS (un-tick to reduce network usage)
Your screen brightness will automatically adjust to your environment and activities. You can move the slider manually to help Adaptive brightness learn your preferences.
Optimise brightness level for available light. When this feature is on, you can still adjust brightness temporarily.

Back up app data, Wi‑Fi passwords and other settings to Google servers

Apps added will use network connections. This will increase the battery consumption. Note that the functions marked in Advanced STAMINA mode settings are not allowed to use network connections, even if you add the same functions/apps in this list.
Consuming apps use processing power. You can reduce battery consumption by force stopping, disabling or uninstalling them.
Battery used when phone is idle
To reduce battery consumption, STAMINA mode restricts rendering performance, device performance** and the following functions (Select a restriction level in STAMINA level):

"*Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated. **Animation and screen brightness are restricted.
Also, an Android power-saving feature is active even when STAMINA mode is not activated, so background data may be restricted during sleep mode.
To add apps active in standby, go to Settings > Battery and tap Battery optimisation in the options menu.
All restrictions are disabled while charging."
"Plugged in, can't charge at the moment"
Prolongs battery time extensively by limiting the available apps to the minimum required

Battery use is an approximation of power use and does not include every source of battery drain. Miscellaneous is the difference between the computed approximate power use and the actual drain observed on the battery.

"When STAMINA mode is activated, GPS, vibration, image enhancement, rendering performance etc. are restricted to reduce battery consumption. Also, as background data is restricted, Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated.
Note that an Android power-saving feature is active even when STAMINA mode is not activated, so background data may be restricted during sleep mode.
To make apps active in standby, tap Battery optimisation in the options menu.
All restrictions are disabled while charging."

"When STAMINA mode is activated, GPS, vibration, image enhancement, etc. are restricted to reduce battery consumption. Also, as background data is restricted, Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated.
To make apps active in standby, tap Battery optimisation in the options menu.
All restrictions are disabled while charging."

"When STAMINA mode is activated, GPS, vibration, etc. are restricted to reduce battery consumption. Also, as background data is restricted, Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated.
To make apps active in standby, tap Battery optimisation in the options menu.
All restrictions are disabled while charging."

"When STAMINA mode is activated, GPS, image enhancement etc. are restricted to reduce battery consumption. Also, as background data is restricted, Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated.
To add apps active in standby, go to Settings > Battery, and tap Power-saving exceptions in the options menu.
All restrictions are disabled while charging."

"When STAMINA mode is activated, GPS, image enhancement, etc. are restricted to reduce battery consumption. Also, as background data is restricted, Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated.
To add apps active in standby, tap Battery optimisation in the options menu.
All restrictions are disabled while charging."

Calling is not restricted. Device performance for general usage such as scrolling is highly restricted. As background data is restricted, internet calls and music streaming are not available and apps may not be auto-synced in the background.
Device performance preferred. (Device performance is restricted but will not affect general usage)
Battery Saver turns off when your phone is at %1$s
Background data is restricted. Device performance in general usage, such as scrolling, is highly restricted.
Background data is restricted. Device performance in general usage, such as scrolling, is highly restricted.

When STAMINA mode is activated, GPS, vibration, image enhancement, rendering performance etc. are restricted to reduce battery consumption. Also, as background data is restricted, Email and other apps that rely on syncing may not be updated.

You can activate STAMINA mode if you’re running low on battery."

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery time significantly. Note that, as internet connection through Wi-Fi and Mobile data will be disabled, functions such as data synchronisation and Wi-Fi calling will be unavailable. Your Home screen will be switched to Ultra STAMINA mode Home.

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery time significantly. Note that as the Internet connection via Wi-Fi and mobile data will be disabled, functions such as data synchronisation and %s will be unavailable. Your Home screen will be switched to Ultra STAMINA mode Home.

"Battery Saver turns off power-consuming features and settings when the battery is below a preset level. You can customise which features should be turned off. Use when battery power is running low and you can't charge your device. Phone calls and text messages are not affected by Battery Saver."

"Where Can I Find operator's Privacy Policy? Separately, if you have questions about %1$s's Privacy Policy, please visit %2$s and click on the \"Privacy Policy\" link."

"Where Can I Find More Information about the Third Party's Policies? Check the app's terms of use and/or the app provider's policies for more information about how the app will collect, access, use and disclose your information. Privacy Policies, Terms of Use and other consumer notices MAY BE available on the app provider's website. Make sure that you are comfortable with the policies before you use an app."

"Which Privacy Policy Applies? %1$s's Privacy Policy and Terms of Use do not apply to apps on your device that are solely provided by third parties. The third party's policies apply to your use of this app."

%3$s Privacy Alert: If you use a third-party app, it may directly collect your personal information or require %2$s to disclose your personal information, including location information (where applicable), to the app provider or another third party.

"Convert data partition to file-based encryption. !!Warning!! This will delete all your data. This feature is alpha, and may not work correctly. Press 'Wipe and convert…' to continue."
Your organisation doesn’t allow personal apps to access your work calendar

"The password that you entered is correct, but unfortunately your data is corrupt.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you’ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account."

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media and other files. After you encrypt your phone, assuming you've set up a screen lock (that is, a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you'll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the phone every time you power it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, erasing all your data.
Encryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt it, you'll lose some or all of your data."

"The internal memory is already encrypted.
By turning encryption of the SD card on, new files and files that have been modified will be encrypted and will not be able to be read on other devices. Already existing files will remain unencrypted as long as they haven't been modified.
Note: It is not possible to turn SD card encryption off once it has been turned on."
You must set a lock screen PIN, pattern or password before you can start encryption.

"With the current exchange settings you are required to encrypt the SD card to be able to access it.
Encryption of the SD card may take several hours depending on the storage capacity.
Encrypt now?"

"With the current Exchange settings, you are required to turn on encryption of the SD card to be able to access it.
Doing this will encrypt new files. Already existing files on the SD card will remain unencrypted until they have been modified.
Encrypt now?"
You have attempted to unlock the phone incorrectly ^1 times. After ^2 more unsuccessful attempts, the phone will be reset to factory default and all user data will be lost.

"Encryption was interrupted and can't be completed. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you need to perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google account."
"The encryption operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you'll lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times."

"Encryption of the SD card will prevent new files from being used on other devices. Unaltered files will still be accessible on other devices until they are modified. Please note that turning on SD card encryption is irreversible.
Note: This action cannot be reversed, except by performing a factory reset, erasing all of your data."
To unlock your phone, turn it off and then on.
Please charge your battery and try again.
Insert SD card to activate, or tap Next to continue

"Encryption of the SD card was interrupted and cannot be completed. As a result, the data on your SD card is no longer accessible.
You need to format your SD card in order to access the data again."

Wait while the external SD card is being encrypted. ^1% complete.
Wait while the internal memory on your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

"STAMINA mode includes:
• Extended standby Saves power when the screen is off by temporarily disabling Wi-Fi and mobile data. Most applications will be inactive. When the screen is ON, your phone will function normally. If you want to keep some apps active while Extended standby is ON, add the apps to the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list.
• Extended usage Saves power when your device is in use by restricting hardware performance. "

"Low battery mode turns off power-consuming features and settings when the battery is below a preset level. Use when your battery power is running low and you can't charge your device. You will still receive phone calls and text messages."
"Low battery mode turns off power-consuming features and settings when the battery is below a preset level. Use when your battery power is running low and you can't charge your device."
Initialising your settings after reboot. Please wait a moment before toggling Low battery mode.

What is STAMINA mode?" STAMINA mode is Sony’s power save function. It extends the battery lifetime when the display is off.
"Basic usage" To turn on STAMINA mode, tap the button on the screen. When the screen is off, in order to save battery life, Wi-Fi and mobile data will be temporarily disabled and most applications will be inactive. When the screen is on, your phone will function normally.
"Advanced usage" If you want to keep some apps active while STAMINA is on, please add the apps into the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list. Applications may not work correctly if they are not added to the list.
"Note" If an application doesn’t work correctly, please register the app in APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY or turn off STAMINA mode."
Enable one or more functions in STAMINA mode to optimise battery time.
Please wait a moment, then try activating Ultra STAMINA Mode again.

"Your phone can't manage battery normally because %1$s is keeping your phone awake.
To try to fix this issue, you can stop the app.
If this keeps happening, you may need to uninstall the app to improve battery performance."

"Your phone can't manage battery normally because %1$s keeps waking up your phone.

"Even with eyes protected by the green spectacles Dorothy and her friends were at first dazzled by the brilliancy of the wonderful City. The streets were lined with beautiful houses all built of green marble and studded everywhere with sparkling emeralds. They walked over a pavement of the same green marble, and where the blocks were joined together were rows of emeralds, set closely, and glittering in the brightness of the sun. The window panes were of green glass; even the sky above the City had a green tint, and the rays of the sun were green.
There were many people, men, women and children, walking about, and these were all dressed in green clothes and had greenish skins. They looked at Dorothy and her strangely assorted company with wondering eyes, and the children all ran away and hid behind their mothers when they saw the Lion; but no one spoke to them. Many shops stood in the street, and Dorothy saw that everything in them was green. Green candy and green pop-corn were offered for sale, as well as green shoes, green hats and green clothes of all sorts. At one place a man was selling green lemonade, and when the children bought it Dorothy could see that they paid for it with green pennies.
There seemed to be no horses or animals of any kind; the men carried things around in little green carts, which they pushed before them. Everyone seemed happy, contented and prosperous."
Chapter 11: The Wonderful Emerald City of Oz
Make all activities resizeable for multi-window, regardless of manifest values.

"Automatically back up device data (such as Wi-Fi passwords and call history) and app data (such as settings and files stored by apps) remotely.
When you turn on automatic backup, device and app data is periodically saved remotely. App data can be any data that an app has saved (based on developer settings), including potentially sensitive data such as contacts, messages and photos."

"You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and app data, media and other files. After you've encrypted your phone, assuming that you've set up a screen lock (a pattern or numeric PIN or password), you'll need to unlock the screen to decrypt the phone every time you power it on. The only other way to decrypt is to perform a factory data reset, deleting all of your data.
Encryption may take from a few minutes up to an hour or more. Your phone must be fully charged and plugged in throughout the process. If you interrupt the encryption, you may lose some or all of your data."

To improve location accuracy, apps and services can still scan for Wi‑Fi networks at any time, even when Wi‑Fi is off. This can be used, for example, to improve location-based features and services. You can change this in LINK_BEGINscanning settingsLINK_END.

"Turn on [Use when screen off] and select apps that you wish to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. The [Battery draining apps] tab shows apps that consume a lot of battery power. The bar below each app indicates battery power consumption."

"Turn on [Use when screen off] and select apps that you wish to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. The [Battery draining apps] tab shows apps that consume a lot of battery power. The bar below each app indicates battery power consumption."

"You can select apps to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. If selected apps do not function properly, deselect them.
The notification light for all apps flashes in the same colour at the same frequency during sleep mode.
STAMINA mode becomes deactivated while charging."

"If selected apps do not function properly, deselect them.
STAMINA mode is deactivated while you are using or charging the device."
"You can set when to activate STAMINA mode by setting the battery threshold from [Activation]. When the battery power drops below the threshold, STAMINA mode is activated."

"STAMINA mode saves battery power by adjusting device settings. You can choose applications to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. (This helps you save battery power because most apps keep draining the battery even during sleep mode.)
Functions disabled for selected apps: - Wi-Fi - Mobile data - Timer
The notification light for all apps flashes in the same colour at the same frequency during sleep mode.
STAMINA mode is deactivated while you are controlling the device."

"STAMINA mode saves battery power by disabling network connections and the timer function during sleep mode for your selected apps. (This helps you save battery power because most apps keep draining the battery even during sleep mode.)
STAMINA mode also adjusts display settings to get the most battery life when the screen is on."
Adjust device settings (e.g. screen frame rate) and turn off Image enhancement to save power when the screen is on
